bug.author: rtitov
bug.description:
Describe the bug AttributeError: Can only use .str accessor with string values! To Reproduce import pandas as pd from pandas_profiling import ProfileReport
data = pd.DataFrame(['Jan', 1]).set_index(0)
profile = ProfileReport(data) To Solved <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22300315/73062119-af072700-3eac-11ea-92c7-421609a0e694.png></denchmark-link>
